Note: Signed "Herbertward." Date based on dates of 1st World War. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text says that France's Day is the 14th of July. Show the people of France that their sacrifice and valour is valued by helping the French Red Cross. Illustration shows a cemetary with the words "The supreme sacrifice."
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I

Title: France's Day : the 14th of July
